---
title: "Model run example"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(yaml)
library(tidyverse)
params <- read_yaml('../params/params.yaml')
devtools::load_all()

```
Create a starting population

```{r}

dd <- generate_pop(params)


```

```{r}

dd2 <- sim_period(dd,365,params)

dd2 |>
  group_by(day) |>
  summarise(n = sum(n)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = day,y = n))+
  geom_line()
```
